title: Hotec Stainless Steel Kitchen Tongs Set of 2 - 9" and 12", Locking Metal Food Tongs Non-Slip Grip
descriptions: Introducing the Hotec Stainless Steel Kitchen Tongs Set of 2 - 9" and 12". Made from durable stainless steel, these tongs are built to last and resist heat, rust, and corrosion. The lightweight design and ergonomic handle with silicon cushioning make them easy and comfortable to use. The pull ring locking mechanism and hanging loop for storage make them convenient and space-saving. With heat-resistant tong heads and a safety design to protect your hands, these tongs are perfect for indoor kitchen tasks, outdoor grilling, flipping burgers/fish, cutting roast meat, BBQ turning, and salad serving. Plus, they're dishwasher safe for easy maintenance. Upgrade your kitchen tools with the Hotec Stainless Steel Kitchen Tongs Set of 2!

Introducing the Hotec Stainless Steel Kitchen Tongs Set of 2 - 9" and 12"! Made from durable stainless steel, these tongs are designed to last a lifetime. With a sturdy and heat-resistant construction, they are perfect for indoor kitchen tasks, outdoor grilling, flipping burgers or fish, cutting roast meat, BBQ turning, and salad serving. 

The set includes a 9 inch cooking tong and a 12 inch BBQ grill tong, both featuring a locking mechanism for easy storage and a hanging loop for convenient access. The ergonomic handle with silicon cushioning ensures a comfortable grip and control, while also protecting your hands from cutting on the edge. 

These tongs are lightweight and easy to handle, making them a must-have for every kitchen. Plus, they are dishwasher safe, making maintenance a breeze. Upgrade your kitchen tools with the Hotec Stainless Steel Kitchen Tongs Set of 2 - 9" and 12" today!
